Text: Bloomberg Energy SeminarPST Original Message To JEFF NRONCOM At Just a reminder that Bloomberg will be hosting a free energy seminar this Wednesday at pm at the Heathman Hotel in downtown Portland To see a description of what will be covered as well as to sign up to secure your spot go to BU GO on your Bloomberg Select Events and Seminars in your Region Choose Portland The energy seminar is the only menu option If you have any questions feel free to contact me at This should be a very informative session that will discuss different aspects of Bloombergs energy product Kristin Hordyke
